column1: #Text=" Yon Rha 's mother says : " The tomato - carrots from your garden are too hard for my gums .
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " Would you like something else from the garden ?
#Text=I would be happy to ... " Yon Rha 's mother says : " Forget your stupid garden !
#Text=Get your grimy hind to the market and buy me some real food !
